manifest.name: Tenor Saxophone - Modal Exploration
manifest.description: Explore the major and minor modes on the tenor saxophone.

front: Explore the major mode in the key of C major in your tenor saxophone.
Explore the minor mode in the equivalent key to C major in your tenor saxophone.
The equivalent key is the key with the same number of flats or sharps as the given major key.
For example, the A minor key is the equivalent to the C major key.
Explore the major mode in the key of G major in your tenor saxophone.
Explore the minor mode in the equivalent key to G major in your tenor saxophone.
The equivalent key is the key with the same number of flats or sharps as the given major key.
For example, the A minor key is the equivalent to the C major key.
